sentences.english: Early warning could enable the government to allocate(11) money and resources to potential disaster areas before disaster strikes.
sentences.chinese: 早期预警可以使政府提前发配物资到潜在灾区。

sentences.english: North Korean football players sent to coal mine after World Cup loss?

sentences.english: Last time,he sent me to a weather ship in the Antactic!
sentences.chinese: 上次他把我发配到了南极的一艘气象飞船上。
